HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings
[System.Serializable]
public
Ultraleap.​TouchFree.​Tooling.​Configuration.​HoverAndHoldInteractionSettings

This class is a container for settings that only apply to the Hover and Hold interaction. In order to modify these settings of the TouchFree Service, create an InteractionConfig, which contains an instance of this class, modify it as required, and then pass to the service using the ConfigurationManager.

Like all of the Settings classes found in this file, all members are optional. If you do not modify a member of this class, its value will not change when the instance is sent to TouchFree Service.

Properties
hoverStartTimeS
public float hoverStartTimeS { get; set }

This determines how long (in seconds) the user must hold their hand in place before the interaction will begin. If the hand remains in place until the interaction completes, a click event will be sent.

hoverCompleteTimeS
public float hoverCompleteTimeS { get; set }

This determines how long (in seconds) the user must hold their hand in place after the interaction has begun before the interaction will complete, and a click event will be sent.

Variables
configValues
public Dictionary<string, object> configValues

This dictionary is used to store the edited members only, and is accessed when serializing the data for transfer to the Service.

DO NOT MODIFY THIS DICTIONARY MANUALLY

HoverStartTimeS
[SerializeField]
private float HoverStartTimeS
HoverCompleteTimeS
[SerializeField]
private float HoverCompleteTimeS
